Hi, we're SoFetch. We work on software.

We recieved a notification from our payment system that your credit card failed to be charged.

Why did your credit card payment fail?

The credit card company does not give us details as to why. We only get a notification from them that says, "Payment failed".

What to do if the payment failed?

We will contact you the next business day to follow-up about it. In the meantime, you could:
  1. Try a different credit card
  2. Contact your credit card company's customer service (we have a handy-dandy list below) to allow a large charge to "Divergent Software, Inc." to be allowed online
  3. Setup ACH with your bank to send us this payment, and future payments, to make everyone's life easier and safer

Customer Service Contact Numbers
